Address.label: Address
Address.value: 519 KIMBALL AVENUE NORTH EAST, ROANOKE, Virginia, 24016, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: RGC Resources Inc is involved in the business of distribution and sale of natural gas to residential, commercial, and industrial customers within its service territory in Roanoke, Virginia and its surrounding localities as well as it also provides certain non-regulated services. The company relies on multiple interstate pipelines to transport natural gas. The company operates in three segments: Gas Utility, which is the key revenue generator; Investment in Affiliates; and Parent & Other.
